thread.title: Austin singers Bob Schneider and Bruce Robison are on the bill
thread.title_full: Austin singers Bob Schneider and Bruce Robison are on the bill - Houston Chronicle

author: chron.com
title: Austin singers Bob Schneider and Bruce Robison are on the bill
text:
Photo: Courtesy Photo Image 1 of / 9 9 Austin favorite Bob Schneider
Photo: Courtesy Photo Austin favorite Bob Schneider Image 2 of 9 Bruce Robison
Photo: Cambria Harkey Bruce Robison Image 3 of 9 The Mighty Orq
Photo: Johnny Hanson, Staff The Mighty Orq Image 4 of 9 Jazz vocalist Jewel Brown performs Thursday in a blues-infused show at Discovery Green.
Photo: Steve Ueckert, HC Staff Jazz vocalist Jewel Brown performs Thursday in a blues-infused show... Image 5 of 9 Marc Anthony, above, will team with Carlos Vives on Friday for a high-energy show at Toyota Center.
Photo: J. Patric Schneider, Freelance Marc Anthony, above, will team with Carlos Vives on Friday for a... Image 6 of 9 Jazz vocalist Jewel Brown performs Thursday in a blues-infused show at Discovery Green.
Photo: handout Jazz vocalist Jewel Brown performs Thursday in a blues-infused show... Image 7 of 9 Marc Anthony, above, will team with Carlos Vives on Friday for a high-energy show at Toyota Center.
Photo: HO Marc Anthony, above, will team with Carlos Vives on Friday for a... Image 8 of 9 Reality star and New Orleans Queen of Bounce Big Freedia.
Reality star and New Orleans Queen of Bounce Big Freedia. Image 9 of 9 Austin singers Bob Schneider and Bruce Robison are on the bill 1 / 9 Back to Gallery Thursday 10.15
The Mighty Orq: Blues and rock. 7 p.m. at the Nightingale, 308 Main; 832-968-3370.
Jewel Brown: Blues, with Milton Hopkins , Trudy Lynn and Steve Krase . 6:30 p.m. at Discovery Green , 1500 McKinney; 713-400-7336.
Bob Schneider : Houston favorite from Austin does pop/rock. 7 and 9:30 p.m. at McGonigel's Mucky Duck, 2425 Norfolk; 713-528-5999.
Howard Jones : '80s hitmaker is still at it. 7:30 p.m. at Dosey Doe, 25911 I-45 N., The Woodland; 281-367-3774.
Friday 10.16
Bruce Robison: Thoughtful Texas singer and songwriter. 7 p.m. at McGonigel's Mucky Duck, 2425 Norfolk; 713-528-5999.
All Time Low: Emo heartthrobs recently featured in the TV film "Fangirl." With Sleeping With Sirens. 6 p.m. at Revention Music Center , 520 Texas; 713-230-1600.
Marc Anthony & Carlos Vives: Tropical sounds from chart-toppers. 8 p.m. at Toyota Center , 1510 Polk; 866-446-8849.
Saturday 10.17
Joe Ely: Texas troubadour. 7 and 9:30 p.m. at McGonigel's Mucky Duck, 2425 Norfolk; 713-528-5999.
Corey Smith : Texas country. 9 p.m. at Firehouse Saloon, 5930 U.S. 59 S.; 713-977-1962.
Cazzette: Swedish DJ and producing duo. 9 p.m. at Stereo Live, 6400 Richmond; 832-251-9600.
Tuesday 10.20
Alvin & the Chipmunks: Singing cartoon characters are enjoying a resurgence. 6:30 p.m. at Revention Music Center, 520 Texas; 713-230-1600.
Wednesday 10.21
Big Freedia: The queen of New Orleans bounce and a reality star. 7:30 p.m. at House of Blues , 1204 Caroline; 888-402-5837.
